GK20bhassv_u:1403: attaṇo cavaḷadāe aṇi vuttavivāhamaṅgaḷo evva gado (BhSv_6.11:5)
GK20bhassv_u:1404: ahaa ahmehiṃ tava a vāsavadattāe a paḍikidiṃ cittaphaḷaāe āḷihia vivāho ṇivvutto (BhSv_6.11:6)
GK20bhassv_u:1408: mama vā mahāsenasya vā yādṛśau gopālakapālakau tādṛśa eva tvaṃ prathamam evābhipreto jāmāteti |
GK20bhassv_u:1412: atha cāvābhyāṃ tava ca vāsavadattāyāś ca pratikṛtiṃ citraphalakāyām ālikhya vivāho nirvṛttaḥ |
GK20bhassv_u:1417: aparāddheṣv api sneho yad asmāsu na vismṛtaḥ // BhSv_6.12 //
GK20bhassv_u:1418: *{padmāvatī}* - ayyautta citragadaṃ guruaṇaṃ pekkhia abhivādeduṃ icchāmi (BhSv_6.12:1)
GK20bhassv_u:1425: haṃ adisadisī khu iaṃ ayyāe āvantiāe (BhSv_6.12:5)
GK20bhassv_u:1427: [ham atisadṛśī khalv iyam āryāyā āvantikāyāḥ | āryaputra sadṛśī khalv iyam āryāyāḥ | ]
GK20bhassv_u:1431: asya snigdhasya varṇasya vipattir dāruṇā katham &
GK20bhassv_u:1432: idaṃ ca mukhamādhuryaṃ kathaṃ dūṣitam agninā // BhSv_6.13 //
GK20bhassv_u:1433: *{padmāvatī}* - ayyauttassa paḍikidiṃ pekkhia jāṇāmi iaṃ ayyāe sadisī ṇa vetti (BhSv_6.13:1)
GK20bhassv_u:1434: [āryaputrasya pratikṛtiṃ dṛṣṭvā jānāmīyam āryayā sadṛśī na veti | ]
GK20bhassv_u:1439: ayyauttassa paḍikidīe sadisadāe jāṇāmi iaṃ ayyāe sadisi tti (BhSv_6.13:4)
GK20bhassv_u:1441: *{rājā}* - devi citradarśanāt prabhṛti prahṛṣṭodvignām iva tvāṃ paśyāmi (BhSv_6.13:5)
GK20bhassv_u:1443: *{padmāvatī}* - ayyautta imāe paḍikidīe sadisī iha evva paḍivasadi (BhSv_6.13:7)
GK20bhassv_u:1448: *{padmāvatī}* - ayyautta mama kaṇṇābhāve keṇa vi bahmaṇeṇa mama bhaiṇiatti ṇṇāso ṇikkhitto (BhSv_6.13:11)
GK20bhassv_u:1450: tā ayyaṃ mae saha āadaṃ pekkhia jāṇādu ayyautto (BhSv_6.13:13)
GK20bhassv_u:1451: [āryaputra mama kanyābhāve kenāpi brāhmaṇena mama bhaginiketi nyāso nikṣiptaḥ |
GK20bhassv_u:1453: tad āryāṃ mayā sahāgatāṃ dṛṣṭvā jānātv āryaputraḥ | ]
GK20bhassv_u:1455: yadi viprasya bhaginī vyaktam anyā bhaviṣyati &
GK20bhassv_u:1459: eso ujjaiṇīo bahmaṇo bhaṭṭiṇīe hatthe mama bhaiṇia tti ṇṇāso ṇikkhitto taṃ paḍiggahiduṃ paḍihāraṃ uvaṭṭhido (BhSv_6.14:3)
GK20bhassv_u:1461: eṣa ujjayinīyo brāhmaṇaḥ bhaṭṭinyā haste mama bhaginiketi nyāso nikṣiptaḥ taṃ pratigrahītuṃ pratihāram upasthitaḥ | ]
GK20bhassv_u:1476: pracchādya rājamahiṣīṃ nṛpater hitārthaṃ kāmaṃ mayā kṛtam idaṃ hitam ity avekṣya &
GK20bhassv_u:1477: siddhe 'pi nāma mama karmaṇi pārthivo 'sau kiṃ vakṣyatīti hṛdayaṃ pariśaṅkitaṃ me // BhSv_6.15 //
GK20bhassv_u:1485: bho brāhmaṇa kiṃ bhavataḥ svasā padmāvatyā haste nyāsa iti nikṣiptā (BhSv_6.15:6)
GK20bhassv_u:1487: *{rājā}* - tena hi tvaryatāṃ tvaryatām asya bhaginikā (BhSv_6.15:8)
GK20bhassv_u:1515: devi praviśa tvam abhyantaraṃ padmāvatyā saha (BhSv_6.15:24)
GK20bhassv_u:1521: bhāratānāṃ kule jāto vinīto jñānavāñ chuciḥ &
GK20bhassv_u:1522: tannāīsi balād dhartuṃ rājadharmasya deśikaḥ // BhSv_6.16 //
GK20bhassv_u:1529: kin nu satyam idaṃ svapnaḥ sā bhūyo dṛśyate mayā &
GK20bhassv_u:1530: anayāpy evam evāhaṃ dṛṣṭayā vañcitas tadā // BhSv_6.17 //
GK20bhassv_u:1537: mithyonmādaiś ca yuddhaiś ca śāstradṛṣṭaiś ca mantritaiḥ &
GK20bhassv_u:1538: bhavadyatnaiḥ khalu vayaṃ majjamānāḥ samuddhṛtāḥ // BhSv_6.18 //
GK20bhassv_u:1544: ārye sakhījanasamudācāreṇājānatyātikrāntaḥ samudācāraḥ tac chīrṣeṇa prasādayāmi | ]
GK20bhassv_u:1550: *{rājā}* - vayasya yaugandharāyaṇa devyapanaye kā kṛtā te buddhiḥ (BhSv_6.18:8)
GK20bhassv_u:1553: *{yaugandharāyaṇaḥ}* - puṣpakabhadrādibhir ādeśikair ādiṣṭā svāmino devī bhaviṣyatīti (BhSv_6.18:11)
GK20bhassv_u:1557: *{yaugandharāyaṇaḥ}* - svāmin devyāḥ kuśalanivedanārtham adyaiva pratinivartatām atrabhavān raibhyo 'trabhavatī ca (BhSv_6.18:15)
GK20bhassv_u:1559: sarva eva vayaṃ yāsyāmo devyā padmāvatyā saha (BhSv_6.18:17)
GK20bhassv_u:1563: mahīm ekātapatrāṅkāṃ rājasiṃhaḥ praśāstu naḥ // BhSv_6.19 //
